lead_paragraph: North Korea issued a New Year’s message that highlighted the reclusive country’s attempt to readjust the focus of six-party nuclear disarmament talks.
snippet: North Korea issued a New Year’s message that highlighted the reclusive country’s attempt to readjust the focus of six-party nuclear disarmament talks.

headline.main: North Korea Calls for Better U.S. Ties
headline.print_headline: North Korea Begins New Year With Call for Better U.S. Relations
